meanings.sent1: I found a greenback in my wallet.
meanings.sent2: The cashier handed me a greenback as change.
meanings.sent3: The greenback in my pocket felt like a lucky charm.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than any greenback.
meanings.sent5: The greenback fluttered to the ground like a colorful leaf.

meanings.definition: A piece of U.S. paper currency.
meanings.sent1: Grandpa collects old greenbacks from different eras.
meanings.sent2: She carefully placed the greenback in her piggy bank.
meanings.sent3: The greenback peeked out from under the couch cushion.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a greenback, valuable and impactful.
meanings.sent5: The greenback crumpled in his hand, worn from many transactions.
